name: campily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a camp way (= creating humour by using bright colours, loud sounds, unusual behaviour, etc.): The film was a little too campily self-conscious for its own credibility.
in a way that some people think is typical of a gay man: In one sequence, he minced around campily while talking in a falsetto.
More examplesFewer examplesThe original trailer for the movie looks campily corny today.Dancers prance around in a weird blend of ballet and disco, campily throwing confetti.
